mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(userId, userPwd, userName, phoneNo, email, address1, address2, regDate) values (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{phoneNo}, #{email}, #{address1}, #{address2}, now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_member where userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: update tbl_member set userPwd=#{userPwd}, email=#{email}, phoneNo=#{phoneNo}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2} where userNo = #{userNo}
